text: The Ghost List is an EP by American post-hardcore band Girls Against Boys, released independently on September 24, 2013. == Track listing == == Personnel == Adapted from The Ghost List liner notes. ; Girls Against Boys * Alexis Fleisig – drums * Eli Janney – keyboards, bass guitar, backing vocals * Scott McCloud – lead vocals, guitar * Johnny Temple – bass guitar ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" !
